page.title: 11SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content:
Grantown-on-Spey has a wide range of sporting facilities. Indoors badminton is played in a number of halls in the town, the main one being the Y.M.C.A. leisure centre, which also has facilities for snooker, pool ,darts and table tennis.
The Grammar school also has facilities for indoor sports which are open to the general public. This includes keep fit on Tuesdays, Aerobics on Wednesdays, and swimming on Tuesdays and Fridays. The cost of swimming is Â£6 for the season but visitors can use the pool for 50p.
There are also plans to build an indoor sports centre but these plans are still at a very early stage.
